long_description: These Slip High Speed Fototec Photochromic sunglasses are designed for narrow faces. Lenses automatically adjust tint in changing light, making them ideal for runners, cyclists and hikers. Fototec photochromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Frames feature High Speed Red Fototec lenses; ideal for strong sun sunlight, lenses provide sharp contrast and are the darkest variable tint lenses from Tifosi. NXT Trivex optical polymer lenses provide superior optical clarity and are virtually indestructible. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Fits small to large faces.
short_description: These Slip High Speed Fototec Photochromic sunglasses are designed for narrow faces. Lenses automatically adjust tint in changing light, making them ideal for runners, cyclists and hikers.
